entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , L'Anse-au-Loup
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:09 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -18.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Blanc-Sablon Airport 11:00 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 56 %

Dewpoint: -25.3°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 23 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18 with temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 18 with temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill minus 28 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning in the morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm except 15 cm inland and over higher terrain. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Windy. Low minus 16. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023
